name: Slash Arena
description:
Win, die and fight again. For how long would you survive?

SlashArena - it is a MMO superior game with edged weapons. Level up your character and its skills, create and improve weapons.

Game features:

★ Up to 64 gamers on one map at the same time
★ Clans and team play
★ PvP in real time without freezing and lags
★ Characters with their own unique skills and abilities
★ Different skins and characters customization
★ A possibility to create and improve various weapons
